title: Ranking the No. 1 Picks From the Last 20 Years | Big Board
description:
'The Ringer Fantasy Football Show' hosts Danny Heifetz and Danny Kelly are joined by Nora Princiotti, and they start by discussing the Russell Wilson rumors (3:34). Then they break down former Clemson quarterback and likely no. 1 overall pick Trevor Lawrence’s skills and college career (16:19). After that they discuss Heifetz’s rankings of the no. 1 picks from the last 20 years (23:26).

Follow 'The Ringer Fantasy Football Show'.

Hosts: Danny Heifetz and Danny Kelly
Guest: Nora Princiotti
